name: T - Emily Caroline
_source: speak;Emily; Mom?!?!{c:wait;300} What're you doing out here?!
speak;Caroline; Looking for YOU and your sister!{c:wait;300} What're YOU doing out here?!
speak;Emily; I just wanted to spend some sister time with Emma and go to a place I like{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Is that so bad?
speak;Caroline; It is when you're unsupervised!{w} I'm going to give it to Sonia for letting you go when we get back.{w} Don't think you're not in trouble either!
